GM8_sprout.changelog:
Switched to libperfmgr for better performance, battery and less heating.
Some stability improvements.

X00T.changelog:
- CLEAN FLASH REQUIRED (If you are coming from build with 4.4 kernel, i.e: before 09.04.2021 build) 

- Updated blobs from LA.UM.9.6.2.r1-04100-89xx.0
- Updated drm widevine to 1.3

alioth.changelog:
- Remove qti telephony injection (Fix SIM-Switcher)
- sepolicy: Address denials
- rootdir: Disable sched_walt_rotate_big_tasks
- Build with Clang 13.0.1
- media: Sync configs with CAF
- audio: Sync configs with CAF
- proprietary-files: Restore all vibrator firmware
- proprietary-files: Unpin Display blobs
- Convert CarrierConfig overlays into RRO
- rro_overlays: {Wifi,Tethering}Overlay: Move to vendor
- Import full QTI Codec2 HAL and switch to Codec2 by default
- libinit: Switch to walleye oreo build fingerprint
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Kernel:
- Merge branch android-4.19-stable android kernel common
- Merge CAF tag "LA.UM.9.12.r1-12800.01-SMxx50.QSSI12.0"
- cpu-boost: Rework
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Installation instruction: https://forum.xda-developers.com/t/rom-11-0-0-alioth-aliothin-arrowos-11-0-official-weekly.4279481/post-85045261

apollo.changelog:
- Drop useless blobs
- Revert to all stock blobs
- Fixed issues with screen recording, bluetooth
- Hals labelled in manifests
- Audio fixups

Use Arrow Recovery for best experience. Find in the below groups:

XDA: https://forum.xda-developers.com/t/rom-official-11-arrowos-vanilla-gapps-aosp.4251089/
Telegram: https://t.me/arrowapolloofficial

beryllium.changelog:
- sdm845-common:
Update blobs to MIUI polaris V12.5.1.0.QDGCNXM
- beryllium: Update blobs from V12.0.3.0.QEJMIXM
- Update display and adreno blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update WFD blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update OMX codecs and VPP to OnePlus6 R
- Update Configstore blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update Power-off alarm blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update ESE, PerMgr and Time services blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update IRQ balance blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Fixed Smart Charging permissions and sepolicy
- Kernel: Merge android-4.9-q google kernel common (4.9.277)
- Kernel: Merge CAF tag LA.UM.9.3.r1-02800-sdm845.0
- Kernel: arch/arm64: dts: disable dfps in jdi fhd panel and ebbg ft8716 panel
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!

cheeseburger.changelog:
- Fixed Smart Charging sepolicy and permissions
- Sepolicy: Address more denials
- Doze: Improve support for AOD
- fstab: Disable force encryption for f2fs
- Update Media blobs from LA.UM.9.2.r1-01800-SDMxx0.0
- Update WFD blobs from phoenix_sprout 11 RKQ1.201123.002
- Fixes for WFD (maybe will work)
- Inlined Camera DotFix (v6.0)
- Fixes sepolicy and permissions for vibration strength into OnePlus settings
- Drop all SF offset related props
- Disable surfaceflinger backpressure
- pocketmode: Rework
- Add dummy libqti-perfd-client
- Kernel: Enable support NTFS
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

cmi.changelog:
! ! ! Firmware and vendor require update to V12.2.4.0.RJACNXM.

- Show FOD Animation settings
- Update WifiOverlay and TetheringOverlay
- wifi: Enable QPower and Deep sleep together
- Remove extra GBoard spacing
- Update CarrierConfig overlays
- More comfortable rounded corners

davinci.changelog:
10/07/2021
- Fixed the fingerprint dialog
- Disabled the SIM is HD capable notification
- Enabled ambient display settings

20/06/2021
- Rebased the device sources
- Switched to the Qualcomm Power HAL
- Switched to a different screen off fod implementation

22/05/2021
- Improved power consumption
- Switched to VantomKernel

11/05/2021
- Updated blobs from MIUI 21.4.28

Notes:
- Recommended firmware is MIUI 20.10.20 or higher (China Beta)
- Minimum firmware is MIUI V12.0.5.0
- Recommended recovery is the OFFICIAL TWRP

dumpling.changelog:
- Fixed Smart Charging sepolicy and permissions
- Sepolicy: Address more denials
- Doze: Improve support for AOD
- fstab: Disable force encryption for f2fs
- Update Media blobs from LA.UM.9.2.r1-01800-SDMxx0.0
- Update WFD blobs from phoenix_sprout 11 RKQ1.201123.002
- Fixes for WFD (maybe will work)

gauguin.changelog:
- Upstream blobs to global.
- Upstream kernel.
- Update light HAL.
- Device tree improvements and performance enhancements.
- Fixed traffic indicator visibility on status bar.
- Misc changes and blob updates.

Note:

ginkgo.changelog:
- Added LCD HBM and CABC in XiaomiParts
- Added missing qti_whitelist sysconfig
- Switched to framework-side safetynet fix
- Disabled useless cnss-diag service
- Improved schedutil governor ratelimits
- Updated clear speaker audio from MIUI12
- Upstreamed kernel to v4.14.245
- Misc optimizations & fixes in kernel

lavender.changelog:
- Kernel: Enable NTFS support
- Kernel: Set default timer to 100HZ
- Set default GPU idle timer to 70ms
- Update redfin fp to September
- Miscellaneous fixes and improvements

lmi.changelog:

miatoll.changelog:
Device Changelogs:

• Upstreamed kernel to 4.14.246
• Merged latest tag LA.UM.9.1.r1-11100-SMxxx0.0 treewide
• Merged tag LA.UM.9.1.r1-11100-SMxxx0.0 in qcacld-3.0, fw-api, qca-wifi-host-cmn, techpack/audio
• Reverted Adreno/Vulkan blobs to v502
• Fixed device freeze issue while charging
• Defined OEM fast charge sysfs node 
• Added offline charging LED indicator 
• Disabled multi color notification LED (miatoll has white led only)
• Removed widevine L1 hacks

raphael.changelog:

sanders.changelog:
Clean flash must (kindly backup your data before flashing)
improved  performance
Enabled ZRAM by default
Tuned ZRAM for better performance
Compiled with hwui for better performance
Switched to Mad Kernel 2.0

surya.changelog:
- perf: Kang app compaction props from lahaina
- rootdir: Fine-tune schedutil rate limits for SDMMAGPIE
- rootdir: Bump hispeed_freq of both clusters for SDMMAGPIE
- rootdir: Disable sched_conservative_pl
- Add prop ro.gfx.driver.1 and label it
- props: Enable usage of dex2oat64
- props: Enable SSR ramdumps
- sepolicy: Address denials
- Build atrace service
- Build mock power stats HAL and label it
- Remove WiFi Aware support
- parts: Add support for LCD HBM and CABC
- parts: Add touchscreen/gaming profiles
- Build with AOSP Clang 13.0.1
- init: Properly set marketname
- init: Switch to walleye oreo build fingerprint
- init: Set hardware revision property
- parts: Update RU and UA translations
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Required to be on android 11 f/w.
- A clean flash is mandatory while switching from pre OSS builds. Please backup your data beforehand!

sweet.changelog:

umi.changelog:
Firmware and vendor require lastest MIUI Stable V12.2.10

- Show FOD Animation settings
- Update WifiOverlay and TetheringOverlay
- wifi: Enable QPower and Deep sleep together
- Remove extra GBoard spacing
- Update CarrierConfig overlays
- More comfortable rounded corners

vayu.changelog:
- Enable AOSP Sim toggle
- Minor refresh rate improvement
- Fix SafetyNet issues for all users
- Fix GoogleCamera mod video recording issue
- Allow all 4 rotations
- Misc changes and improvements

NOTE
- Requires MIUI 12.5 firmware (any region), but if you face issues with the latest you can use 12.0.4.0 or above. (More info: See XDA thread FAQ section)
- These builds include custom source compiled vendor and ODM partitions
- See full device changes at: https://github.com/ArrowOS-devices?q=vayu

violet.changelog:
- Updated blobs to LA.UM.9.1.r1-10200-SMxxx0.0
- Removed Violet parts and added Mi sound Enhancer to Settings>sounds and fps meter can be accessed through QS tiles
- Removed Smart Charging
- Enabled 24bit Playback as default
- Fixes weird touch/scroll issues on fp touch event
- Added Color modes 
- Enabled iorap
- Rebased and updated kernel to LA.UM.9.1.r1-10200-SMxxx0.0
- Upstreamed media HAL to LA.UM.9.1.r1-10200-SMxxx0.0
- Added LSE Atomic Optimization
- Added Dev frequency boost
- Backported LZ4 from mainline
